College_Summary: IIM Sirmaur is a Centrally Funded Institution of National Importance set up by the Government of India in 2015. It is one of the newer institutions of the IIM family in the country, but it has already achieved remarkable milestones in terms of academic excellence, research, innovation and social impact. It is currently being mentored by IIM Lucknow, one of the oldest and most reputed IIMs in India.

College_Summary: IIT Mandi, established in 2009, is a public research university and one of the eight new second-generation IITs. The campus of the institute sprawls over 538 acres and is situated in Kamand Valley, Mandi in the Mandi district of Himachal Pradesh. IIT Mandi offers more than 30 courses including BTech, MTech, MSc, MA, and PhD. However, BTech remains the most sought-after course among all the other programs. JEE Advanced scores are considered for admission to the IIT Mandi BTech program. Furthermore, the institute also accepts other national-level tests like GATE and IIT JAM for its MTech and MSc programs respectively.

College_Summary: Shoolini University, Solan is a private university established in the year 2009. Shoolini University is approved by UGC, AICTE, BCI, and PCI. The university is accredited with B++ Grade by NAAC and is ISO-certified. As per NIRF Rankings 2023, Shoolini University is ranked at 73rd position among all the Indian Universities. The university offers UG, PG and PhD programs in the fields of Management Science, Science, Law, Agriculture, Food Technology, Engineering, Design, Liberal Arts etc. Shoolini University has global tie-ups with 250+ universities. The university also offers online and distance education programs. Shoolini University has been ranked as the Number 1 Private University in India by The World University Rankings 2024 and QS World University Rankings 2024.

College_Summary: RPGMC Kangra is a top institution spread across 47 acres of land. The college provides highly advanced facilities to its students, which include a central library, hostel, auditorium, art center, and guest house for visitors.

College_Summary: Bahra University, approved by University Grants Commission (UGC) is located in the Shimla Hills, Solan, and was established in the year 2011. The University is one of the leading members of the Association of Indian Universities (AIU). Bahra University has been ranked as the Number 1 University in Himachal Pradesh and has grabbed the 13th position in India by Silicon Valley 2014.

The Institute of Hotel Management Catering and Nutrition, Shimla with its old-world air, quaint charm and a striking view of the Himalayan Range is the perfect ambience for an eager learner. The institute offers a variety of courses like B.SC, Diploma and different Training programs for persons with disability. It also took up a “Hunar se Rojgar tak” project which provides various free courses under the CBSP scheme sponsored by the Ministry of Tourism, Government of India and a few short-term courses as well.

College_Summary: Founded in 2015, Abhilashi University is a government recognised university ranked 841 in the country by UNI Rankings. The flagship programs of Abhilashi University are MBA and M.Tech. Admission to these programs are done on the basis of CAT/ XAT/ MAT/ HPCET/ GATE scores. Apart from this, some of the major courses include BAMS, BA B,Ed, B.Sc B.Ed, M.Sc and PhD. Selection to these courses is based on NEET UG/ UGC NET/ SLET conducted on the national level and AUCET conducted by the university. Check: Abhilashi University Admission 2024

As a residential campus, there are eight dorms for boys and four for girls, along with apartments for the faculty and staff.

College_Summary: Jaypee University of Information Technology (JUIT) offers various undergraduate, postgraduate courses and doctorate level studies and research in the disciplines of Engineering, Applied Sciences and Humanities & Social Sciences. The flagship courses are B.Tech and M.Tech offered in various specialisations. It is ranked amongst top Engineering Institutes by NIRF, MHRD, GoI since last 7 years and has excellent Placement record with top multinationals. The highest salary offered was at INR 32 LPA by Amazon followed by 31.5 LPA offered by Amazon, the average salary was offered at INR 7 LPA. Some of the major recruiters are Amazon, InfraMarket, Lowe’s India, Byjus and many more. Check: JUIT Placements

College_Summary: Chaudhary Sarwan Kumar Himachal Pradesh Krishi Vishwavidyalaya is an agricultural university at Palampur in the Indian state of Himachal Pradesh. It was established on 1 November 1978 as an expansion of the existing College of Agriculture established in May 1966. Hill agriculture is the focus of this university. The university is accredited by the Indian Council of Agricultural Research (ICAR). The college offers undergraduate courses for B. Tech in various disciplines. The college also offers a 2-year programme for M.SC and M.V.SC under different specialisations. It is ranked 11th amongst 75 ICAR Universities of India.

College_Summary: Eternal University, Baru Sahib was established under the Himachal Pradesh Private Universities Act with effect from April 29, 2008. It is a Self-Financed Private University recognized by the UGC under the UGC act of 1956. It is located at a sprawling 8, 00,000 sq. ft campus at Baru Sahib. It is NAAC accredited & ISO 9001: 2015 Certified University established under the Himachal Pradesh Private University (Establishment & Regulation) Act 2006 & Himachal Pradesh Government Act.no. 3 of 2009

IIIT Una is one of the 20 IIITs being set up under the Public-Private Partnership (PPP) Scheme by the Government of India. The institute is recognized as an Institute of National Importance by the Ministry of Education. At present, IIIT Una offers BTech and Ph.D. programs under different specializations.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Master of Technology [M.Tech] (Computer Science and Engineering)

College_Summary: Baddi University of Emerging Sciences and Technologies (BUEST), commonly known as Baddi University was established in 2002 and recognized as a university in 2009. Spread over 40 acres of land, the institute has built up an impressive structure for academics with project-based learning and excellent placements. Admission to professional courses in the university is entirely based on Merit. The merit list is prepared by analyzing the marks scored by candidates in the entrance examination conducted by the University. The University conducts entrance examinations in both offline and online mode. It offers various courses in fields such as engineering, management, nursing, etc.

Maharishi Markandeshwar University, Solan (MMU Solan) is a private university that was established in the year 2010. MMU offers a total of 37 UG and PG courses across 4 different branches like School of Computer Technology, Medicine & Health Sciences, School of Business Management and Engineering & Technology. The admission is based on both merit and entrance exams such as NEET-UG, NEET-PG, JEE Main, GATE. For MBA and PGDM courses, a qualifying MAT exam is necessary. It offers both (online and offline) modes of admission when the admission session begins.

Arni University, Kangra in Himachal Pradesh is a well-organized university offering the utmost number of scholarships to its students in the form of fee waivers. The university offers Undergraduate and Postgraduate programs in the streams of Technology, Management, Commerce, Medical, Arts, and Science. Admission to these courses is both merit and entrance-based.

College_Name: University Institute of Information Technology, Himachal Pradesh University - [UIIT], Shimla
College_Summary: University Institute of Information technology (UIIT) is a leading government institute for B.Tech in information technology programs in Northern India. The college has a close collaboration with the IT industry which helps the institute to give a competitive edge to other institutes. It offers B. TECH in five branches. The admission is done on the basis of marks obtained in the Entrance exam i. e. HPCET (Himachal Pradesh Common Entrance Test).

IEC University is a private university located at the HIMUDA education hub, near the village Kallujhanda, Solan district, Himachal Pradesh. IECU aim is to deliver multi-disciplinary world-class education through effective and efficient processes to make it accessible to all sections of the society. IEC University faculty is also well trained and experts in their respective fields.

Established by the ­­­Government of Himachal Pradesh in 2012, the Career Point University, Hamirpur provides courses in the field of Engineering and technology, Computer Application and IT, Basic and Applied Sciences, Business & Managements, Vocational and Legal Studies. CPU is UGC approved and has 16 departments and 10 research areas.

Sri Sai University (SSU) is a private university established in the year 2010 at Palampur, Himachal Pradesh. It offers a variety of Undergraduate, Post-graduate & Doctoral courses in fields such as Engineering and Technology, Management, Commerce, Applied Sciences, Computer Applications, Humanities, and Social sciences are available. The university has the word-class infrastructure and aims to provide quality education under a strong team of qualified faculty members.

Green Hills Engineering College (GHEC), Solan is managed by a trust   constituting of members who are education oriented. Members of the GHEC Society are always willing to propagate knowledge through discipline and spread the light of education.

Alakh Prakash Goyal Shimla University (APG Shimla) has been awarded as Asia’s Greatest Brand and the Most Promising University in the year 2019 and 2017 respectively. It offers various undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the fields of Engineering, Arts, Journalism and Mass Communication such as B.Tech, BJMC, M.Tech, MJMC, Ph.D., etc. The admission of such programs is based on merit in past academics and several entrance exams. The University also conducts its own entrance test, AIECST. AP Goyal Shimla University has a record of providing 100% placement assistance and provides training and internship from the first semester. The highest package is recorded at INR 32 LPA and the average package is INR 3.6 LPA. More than 5000 students have been placed in their on-campus recruitment.

College_Name: Rajiv Gandhi govt. Engineering college -[RGGEC], Kangra
College_Summary: Rajiv Gandhi Government Engineering College (RGGEC) is a state government-funded institute established in 2014 at Kangra, Himachal Pradesh. The college is affiliated to Himachal Pradesh Technical University and has been approved by AICTE. Presently, it offers a 4-year B.Tech program across four specializations and a 5-year B.Arch program at the UG level. The college has a training & placement cell to provide good training and employment opportunities.

The campus is spread over 160000 sq. feet over 7 blocks.

The University is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and is recognized by The University Grants Commission of India (UGC). The university is envisioned to become an educational institution of the first choice of the students, teaching, and research community and be recognized for providing excellent opportunities for global success.

The University is sponsored by The ICFAI Society - a not-for-profit educational society established in 1984.

The institute is affiliated to Himachal Pradesh Technical University (HIMTU) and recognized by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE). The institute is the result of self-help movement under the Chairmanship of great visionary Sh. Kailash Chand Goel & Managing Trustee Mr. Pramod Garg.

Manav Bharti University (MBU), is a state private university located in Solan district of Himachal Pradesh. It offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in engineering, management, law, pharmacy, commerce and humanities field. The admissions are done through standard entrance exams of the courses or the university entrance exam conducted by MBU. The hostel facility of the univeristy makes it one of the choice of the students living in far flung areas.

College_Name: Himalayan Group of Professional Institutions, Sirmaur
College_Summary: Himalayan Group of Professional Institutions was established in 2002. It is AICTE approved and functions under the Maa Saraswati Educational Trust which was also registered in the same year with the State of Haryana. Under HGPI, there are 7 running institutions for Engineering & Technology, Management, Computer Science, Nursing, Pharmacy, Education, Law, and Skill Development. Recently, HGPI has proposed Himalayan Skill University. HGPI provides Bachelor's, Masters’s, and Diploma courses in multiple disciplines.

CU runs under Chitkara Educational Trust. The University campus is spread over 17 acres located at Atal Shiksha Kunj in Barotiwala, Himachal Pradesh. University has tie-ups with a number of international universities, offering exchange programs to the students across different departments.

College_Summary: Inter National Institute of Fashion Design (INIFD) located in Hamirpur district is the dominant fashion design institute in Himachal Pradesh since 2001. Since its inception INIFD has grown steadily every year in terms of its facilities and apprenticeship. The students are voyaged towards excellence in design, fashion and vocation. The institute channelizes the creativity of every student so as to present them at par with the international standards. INIFD is the pioneer in digital education with design pads for all the students along with world class infrastructure consisting of tuck shops, textile labs, interior labs and many more.

National Institute of Fashion Technology, Kangra is a prominent Fashion School of India..The Institution has been offering Bachelor of Design Program under 4 Major Specializations and Bachelor of Fashion Technology (BFT) in Apparel Production since 2009. In the Bachelor of Design program, the Institute is currently offering specialization in Fashion Design, Accessory Design, Textile Design, and Fashion Communication. All the admissions are done through the General Ability Test (GAT) followed by the Creative Ability Test (CAT) and Situation Test which is conducted by the National Institute of Fashion Technology every year.

Himachal Institute of Dental Sciences is the only Institute in Himachal Pradesh that has an intake capacity of 100 seats for BDS. It offers modern infrastructural resources, hostel facilities, necessary transport amenities and complete campus security to all the students. This Institute was the brainchild of Doctor V K Gupta who was the founder of the Trust. He established this Institute with vision to generate men with integrated minds and not just scholars or job hunters.

The college is affiliated to Himachal Pradesh University and all the admissions are carried out under its guidelines. The college welcomes students based on their performance in NEET UG and NEET PG examinations.

Lord Mahavira Nursing College is preparing nurses to serve the humanity with dedication and dignity. The institute offers GNM and B.Sc Nursing courses approved by INC – Indian Nursing Council. The courses follow the norms of INC. The faculties are highly qualified and renowned in the nusing education industry. They follow a distinct teaching and learning process to make the students comfortable with their studies and make them feel proud on their education. Students are educated professionaly with holistic education apart from the regular curriculam studies. The college teaches students to be responsible human beings first and then quality human beings as the profession demands so. The institution is run by the management of Mata Bhakti Devi Welfare Society and located in Shimla, Himachal Pradesh. Indian Institute of Education is approved by the National Council for Teacher Education (NCTE), Bar Council of India (BCI), and Indian Nursing Council (INC). The institute is affiliated to Himachal Pradesh University (HPU).

Lakshya Institute of Education is offering its services in the field of education in B.Ed. The highly qualified faculty members of the college are responsible for the future of the students and the college. They employ the best teaching learning methodology to impart education based on intellectual, spiritual, and physical aspects for the betterment of the students. The institute is fostering the prospective teachers for the nation who would serve all with dedication and responsibility. The infrastructure oof the college is vast and comprises all necessary aspects to facilitate the students in every manner. Co-curriculam activities form a part of the syllabus to enlighten the development of the students from every angle. The library provides necessary books and journals for gaining some extra knowledge and is updated from time to time.

Established by the Nalanda Education Society the Nalanda College of Education is serving the society by producing dedicated teachers who carve the future of thousands students. With an ambition to educate tribal and backward people of the state the college is providing marvelous facilities. The college has a huge building in which all the classrooms are finely ventilated and the spacious labs with advanced equipment which comforts every teacher trainee.  With all the modern facilities and state art infrastructure the college and its management are playing a crucial role in producing responsible teachers to the society.

Govt., H.P. University & N.C.T.E.  Jaipur. It offers B. Ed. (intake 200), M. Ed. (intake 35), J.B.T. (intake 50) and B.C.A. (intake 40) for the students. S.V.N College of Education is accredited by the (NAAC) National Assessment and Accreditation Council. The college has state of art infrastructure provided with essential facilities for imparting quality of education. The faculty of the college is qualified and experienced in their field of expertise.

Vaishno College of Education is a part of Vaishno Group of Institutions and is one of the top few colleges that provide the best education in this field. They are totally driven towards quality and excellence. They believe behind a successful student there are two things: a students’ hard work and a teacher’s proper guidance, without the proper coordination of both of these things a student can never be successful.
They have a proper code of conduct and strict rules and regulations for both students and teachers. Set up in a beautiful location, the campus and the college are done up beautifully in whatever space they have. They also conduct a number of cultural fests as they believe the students should have academic as well as co-curricular exposure, as well as this, helps in shaping up the personality of the student.

Chamba Millennium Education College (CMEC) was established in the year of 2007 due to the immense importance of the teaching profession in the city Chamba. The college is run by the Chamba Millennium Educational Society, which offers various courses which are approved by the Government of Himachal Pradesh. The aim of the college is to provide excellent academic and physical environment to the students so that they can get the chance of learning and developing their personality with the help of the best institution according to the needs of the industry.

College_Name: Himalayan Institute of Computer Science, Sirmaur

College_Summary: Himachal Pradesh Technical University (HPTU), established in 2011, is a government university in Hamirpur, Himachal Pradesh. The varsity offers a total of 147 courses across 9 streams. The most popular courses offered by the varsity are B.Tech, B.Pharma, M.Tech, and MCA.

Himachal Pradesh University (HPU), Shimla is one of the renowned universities in India. HPU is accredited Grade ‘A’ by NAAC & it is UGC approved. The university has four campuses including a Regional center located at Dharamshala. HPU, Shimla has granted affiliation to 356+ Colleges till today. It is the only residential, multi-faculty university in the State that offers formal and distance higher education to urban, rural, and tribal communities. Check HPU Distance Education

College_Summary: CUHP or Central University of Himachal Pradesh is a public University funded and regulated by the University Grants Commission (UGC). CUHP offers more than 45 courses across several disciplines including Science, Arts, Management, Technology, Education, etc. CUHP has been accredited by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC). It is also approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE).

College_Name: Maharaja Lakshman Sen Memorial College - [MLSM], Sundarnagar
College_Summary: Maharaja Lakshman Sen Memorial College (MLSM) is located in Sundarnagar, Himachal Pradesh. The college is approved by UGC and is affiliated with Himachal Pradesh University, Shimla. It offers B.A, B.Sc, B.Com, B.Ed, B.E.P, B.P.Ed, BCA and BBA at UG level and M.Sc at PG level. Admission to these courses is based on merit or an entrance test. Candidates can apply to college in both online and offline mode.

The university is approved by the University Grants Commission (UGC) and ranked 5 among NLU’s by CLAT Cutoff list. At present, the university provides students with undergraduate programs, postgraduate programs and doctoral programs.

College_Summary: Government Polytechnic Paonta Sahib (GPPS) located at Sirmaur in Himachal Pradesh state was established in the year of 2013. It offers diploma courses in Engineering and Science branches. Admissions to this college is strictly based on merit and in addition, the college provides scholarships for the students who could not afford to the fees for the diploma courses available here because of their financial status and community. The institute has plenty of labs to serve all its diploma courses. Placements are decent but the diploma courses fetch lesser salary.

College_Summary: Goverment Polytechnic, Hamirpur Himachal Pradesh was set up in 1963, with 5 branches to provide the much-needed emphasis on the growth of Technical Education in the country. The institute marched ahead in the path of progress too in the following years. This institute not only has achieved excellence in the field of Technical Education but has also played a major role in the growth of the field and the community.

Government Polytechnic, Kangra is a public/ government Institute located in Kangra, Himachal Pradesh. It has been approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and is affiliated to Board of Technical Education, U.P.

Government Polytechnic Rohru at Shimla, Himachal Pradesh was started first with diploma in Electronics & Communication. Then, in the year 1992, diploma in pharmacy was started. The Institute is approved by AICTE for diploma in engineering courses and for diploma in pharmacy, it is approved by PCI. The institute is affiliated to Himachal Pradesh Takniki Shiksha Board. The academy system for these two courses differs: Electronics and communication engineering has semester system, while the pharmacy has annual system. For the admission, a nominal fee of INR 10,179/- is fixed by the state government.

College_Summary: Shoolini University Online is a distance learning university in Solan, Himachal Pradesh which came into existence in 2022. The university offers various courses in diverse disciplines at the undergraduate and the postgraduate level. It is India’s first online university which offers Pay after Placement option for the students. Admission to the courses offered by the university is done based on the candidate’s performance in the previous qualifying examination. Some of the top recruiters that recruit Shoolini’s students include LG, ICICI Bank, Nestle, L&T and One Score among various others.
